<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 19"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Sky-Piercing Bow](/Equipment.aspx?ID=950)
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Fists of the Ruby Phoenix</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Pathfinder #167: Ready? Fight!](/Sources.aspx?ID=86) pg. 74

**Price** 40,000 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 2 hands

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Base Weapon** [Composite Shortbow](/Weapons.aspx?ID=75)
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Large turquoise gems stud the outer edge of this sturdy _+3 [greater striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [ghost touch](/Equipment.aspx?ID=297) [composite shortbow](/Weapons.aspx?ID=75)_. Arrows shot from the bow are unimpaired by wind and air effects.

**Activate** <actions string="Two Actions" /> Interact ([conjuration](/Traits.aspx?ID=33), [teleportation](/Traits.aspx?ID=156))
 **Frequency** once per day;   **Effect** You shoot an arrow at an open space on a surface within 500 feet and momentarily vanish into a wind that carries the arrow. You teleport to that location.

**Activate** <actions string="Two Actions" /> command, Interact ([electricity](/Traits.aspx?ID=56))
 **Frequency** once per hour;   **Effect** You shoot an arrow at the sky and it tears an extraplanar rift that resembles a storm cloud in a 30-foot burst centered on a point within 200 feet. A torrent of rain pours down from the rift for 1 minute or until you Dismiss the effect. The area within the torrent becomes difficult terrain for all movement (including [Flying](/Actions.aspx?ID=94)). As an Interact action, you can fire an arrow into the rift to cause a bolt of lightning to strike a creature in the area. The creature takes 5d12 lightning damage and must attempt a DC 41 [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex save.

**Activate** <actions string="" /> 10 minutes (command, envision, Interact);  **Frequency** once per week;   **Effect** You fire a volley of arrows into the sky. You create the effects of a successful [_control weather_](/Rituals.aspx?ID=9) ritual.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Sky-Piercing Bow
